short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open source, self-hosted platform for sharing and managing your most frequently used links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slash is an open source, self-hosted platform for sharing and managing your most frequently used links. Easily create customizable, human-readable shortcuts to streamline your link management.

This project is under active development. If you have some issues or suggestions, please feel free to tell us. https://github.com/yourselfhosted/slash/issues
